title: Ive never considered a champ "antifun" until now.
body:
Ive been playing this game since {{champion:131}}  was released and seen my fair share of nerfs to champs that were considered "antifun". The most notable ones are {{champion:122}} {{champion:76}} which may have been frustrating to play against but they had clear counterplay and I always felt like its my skill level that determines the win against them. The same cannot be said about {{champion:127}}.

 This champ is the most infuriating thing to play against. There is no counterplay with her. You beat her up she ults you die. You farm under tower she ults you die. You get a jungle gank, she ults herself blows up one or both of you flashes away. Late game she one shots a carry unless you focus her which she then ults herself then {{item:3157}} and then you lose the teamfight because you blew things on a champ that can never die. SOMETHING NEEDS TO BE DONE ABOUT LISSANDRA.

They only thing I think is too strong on her is the objective control with her E. She just has counterplay with picks noone takes anymore like {{champion:119}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:21}} {{champion:1}}

her counter play is hard cc, most hard cc are skill shots, her passive makes it nearly impossible to land hard cc such as stuns on her, and slows mean nothing to her. You have to get in range to use said cc 9 times out of 10 she'll just hope right out of the cc range. Come back when you actually have useful counter play tips
And does point-and-click stuns have counterplay?

No counterplay? Unleash enough AOE burst in a team fight that she's forced to go into stasis and proceed to ignore her entirely. 

She has excellent matchups versus melee champs due to her amazing crowd control but she's not the only champ in the game to murder melees top lane and one-shotting a carry really doesn't happen. She scales poorly compared to most mages and if you want an assassin mage there are better ones.

Darius?

Play a melee against Darius at top and don't ask for jungler assistance. 

Then maybe you will reconsider whether he has counterplay or not.
